#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iomanip>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    long long int T,M,N,x,y;
   
    scanf("%lld",&T);
    while(T--){
       y = 0;
       
       scanf("%lld",&M);
       N = 4*M;
        x = ((N)*(N-1)*(N-2))/6;
        if(M>2){
            y = ((M)*(M-1)*(M-2)*4)/6;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",x-y);
    }
return 0;
}
